extracted_playbook.condition: Has the organization patched for Citrix CVE-2019-19781?

extracted_playbook.title: Follow CISA Alert AA20-031A
extracted_playbook.description: Implement the recommendations in CISA Alert AA20-031A for suspected compromise related to Citrix CVE-2019-19781.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is Windows Active Directory in use and compromise suspected?

extracted_playbook.title: Remediate Compromised Windows Active Directory Forest
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct remediation of the compromised Windows Active Directory forest if compromise is suspected.

extracted_playbook.title: Rebuild/Reimage Compromised NetScaler Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Rebuild or reimage compromised NetScaler devices if compromise is suspected.

extracted_playbook.title: Audit Configuration and Patch Management Programs
extracted_playbook.description: Routinely audit configuration and patch management programs to ensure security.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Network Traffic
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor network traffic for unexpected and unapproved protocols, especially outbound to the internet (e.g., SSH, SMB, RDP).

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Implement multi-factor authentication, especially for privileged accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Separate Administrative Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Use separate administrative accounts on separate administration workstations.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Principle of Least Privilege
extracted_playbook.description: Implement the principle of least privilege on data access.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Remote Access Solutions
extracted_playbook.description: Secure RDP and other remote access solutions using multifactor authentication and 'jump boxes' for access.

extracted_playbook.title: Deploy Endpoint Defense Tools
extracted_playbook.description: Deploy endpoint defense tools on all endpoints; ensure they work and are up to date.

extracted_playbook.title: Keep Software Up to Date
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure all software is kept up to date to protect against vulnerabilities.
